metadata.title: CVE-2020-25630 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle where the decompressed size of zipfiles was not checked against available user quota before unzipping them,which could lead to a denial of service risk. This affects versions 3.9 to3.9.1, 3.8 to 3.8.4, 3.7 to 3.7.7, 3.5 to 3.5.13 and earlier unsupportedversions. Fixed in 3.9.2, 3.8.5, 3.7.8 and 3.5.14.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
